description: An example resource schema demonstrating some basic constructs and validation rules.

sink.description: Ingestion destination of a Data Lake Pipeline.

Type.description: Type of ingestion destination of this Data Lake Pipeline.

MetadataProvider.description: Target cloud provider for this Data Lake Pipeline.

MetadataRegion.description: Target cloud provider region for this Data Lake Pipeline.

PartitionFields.description: Ordered fields used to physically organize data in the destination.

source.description: Ingestion destination of a Data Lake Pipeline.

Type.description: Type of ingestion source of this Data Lake Pipeline.

ClusterName.description: Human-readable name that identifies the cluster.

CollectionName.description: Human-readable name that identifies the collection.

DatabaseName.description: Human-readable name that identifies the database.

GroupId.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal character string that identifies the project.

partitionFields.description: Ordered fields used to physically organize data in the destination.

FieldName.description: Human-readable label that identifies the field name used to partition data.

Order.description: Sequence in which MongoDB Cloud slices the collection data to create partitions. The resource expresses this sequence starting with zero.

transformations.description: Ordered fields used to physically organize data in the destination.

Type.description: Type of transformation applied during the export of the namespace in a Data Lake Pipeline.

Id.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies your project.

Profile.description: Profile used to provide credentials information, (a secret with the cfn/atlas/profile/{Profile}, is required), if not provided default is used

ProjectId.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies your project.

State.description: State of the Data Lake Pipeline.

Name.description: Name of this Data Lake Pipeline.

CreatedDate.description: Timestamp that indicates when the Data Lake Pipeline was created.

LastUpdatedDate.description: Timestamp that indicates the last time that the Data Lake Pipeline was updated.

Transformations.description: Ingestion destination of a Data Lake Pipeline.
